column4: Hey guys, when I leave my laptop on overnight using 8.10, in the morning there is just a black screen and I cannot do anything to get out of it.. The laptop is on but not responding is this a known issue??

Hey guys, when I leave my laptop on overnight using 8.10, in the morning there is just a black screen and I cannot do anything to get out of it.. The laptop is on but not responding is this a known issue??
i have had something like that in debian, usually if I shut down with windows open,
